StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateCandidatePriorService]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@MarineCandidateID int ,@ComponentCode varchar(2) ,@BeginDate date.me ,@EndDate date.me ,@Separa.onCode varchar(4) ,@ReenlistmentCode varchar(2) ,@ServiceCharacter char(1) ,@Veri.ca.on varchar(10) ,@PmosCode varchar(4) ,@ServiceID int ,@CurrentlyInReserves char(1) ,@EndOfObligatedServiceDate date.me ,@Pros decimal(10,1) ,@Cons decimal(10,1) ,@UserLogin varchar(15)) AS
UPDATE [dbo].[CANDIDATE_PRIOR_SERVICE] SET [BEGIN_DATE] = @BeginDate ,[SEPARATION_CODE] = @Separa.onCode ,[REENLISTMENT_CODE] = @ReenlistmentCode ,[SERVICE_CHARACTER] = @ServiceCharacter ,[VERIFICATION] = @Veri.ca.on ,[PMOS_CODE] = @PmosCode ,[SERVICE_ID] = @ServiceID ,[CURRENTLY_IN_RESERVES] = @CurrentlyInReserves ,[END_OF_OBLIGATED_SERVICE_DATE] = @EndOfObligatedServiceDate ,[PROS] = @Pros ,[CONS] = @Cons ,[USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE [MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] = @MarineCandidateID AND [COMPONENT_CODE] = @ComponentCode AND [END_DATE] = @EndDate
